participant_1.background:
I'll be inside cleaning and my dogs will be outside playing in the fresh air.
I don't own a car because I value my time and prefer to take public transportation or walk to restaurants.
i like lizards.
i drive a honda civic.
I'm a go-getter and always looking for ways to challenge myself.

participant_2.background:
I like to read fairytales on the weekends because they are a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
i work for a clothes retailer.
i have a family of three daughters.
My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
I am a software engineer who works remotely, so I can live in a big city and still take care of my parents in my hometown.

content.text: Hey, what are you up to today?
Hi, I'm working on a blog post about fairytales. I have three daughters and love reading them fairytales at night.
I love fairytales! They are such a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
Yes, they are! I'm so glad I have them to read to my girls. They love them so much.
That's a tough one! I think I would have to say Beauty and the Beast. It's such a beautiful story about love and sacrifice.
I love that one too! It's so romantic.
Yes, it is! I also love the story of Cinderella. It's a great story about perseverance and hope.
Those are both great choices! I love fairytales!
Me too! They are so much fun to read and they always have a happy ending.
Yes, they do! I'm glad I have you to remind me of all the good things in life.
I'm glad I could help! Have a great day!
